General.Name: Avenir Telecom S.A.
General.Description: Avenir Telecom S.A. designs and distributes mobile phones and mobility accessories in Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Asia, Oceania, and the Americas. The company also provides chargers, cables, memory cards, and screen protectors. It offers its products under the Energizer brand. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Marseille, France.
